Package at.easydiet.view

This package contains all background classes for the Pivot GUI

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
EasyDietContentViewListener Listens to changes in the EasyDietContentView
EasyTableViewRowEditor.RowEditorListener The row editor listener interface.
TimeSpanContainerListener This is the TimeSpanContainer listener
 

Class Summary
CreateDietPlanView Background class for the CreateDietPlanView.bxml Provides data and methods for the GUI.
CreateDietTreatmentView Background class for the CreateDietTreatmentView.bxml Provides data and methods for the GUI.
CreateParametersetView Background class for the CreateParametersetView.bxml Provides data and methods for the GUI.
CreateRecipeView This is the background class for the CreateRecipeView.bxml
DashboardView This is the background class for the DashBoardView.bxml It provides data and methods for the GUI
DietPlanManagementView This is the abstract background class for creating and editing a DietPlanBO
DietTreatmentDetailView This is the background class for viewing and changing a DietTreatmentBO
DietTreatmentManagementView This is the abstract background class for creating and editing a DietTreatmentBO
DietTreatmentNavigationButton This button is used as the navigation button for a DietTreatmentDetailView in the GUI
EasyAlerts Defines look and feel of the alerts showing up in EasyDiet
EasyDietContentView Defines the look and feel of the EasyDiet application window content
EasyDietContentView.NavigationButton Defines the button in the navigation bar
EasyDietContentView.ToolbarButton Defines the button in the toolbar
EasyDietContentViewListener.Adapter Table pane listener adapter.
EasyDietMainWindow This is the background class for the startup window.
EasyTableViewRowEditor This editor is used to edit tableviews.
EasyTableViewRowEditor.RowEditorListener.Adapter Row editor listener adapter.
EasyTableViewRowEditor.RowEditorListenerList Row editor listener list.
EditDietPlanView This is the background class for the EditDietPlanView.bxml
ImageLabel Renders an image and a lable aligned horizontally
MealContainer This is the Component to store and handle MealBOs
ParameterTableView Shows a tableView which handles parameters
ParameterTableViewTemplate This is the background class for the ParameterTableViewTemplate.bxml
PatientDetailView This is the background class for the PatientDetailView.bxml
PatientLikeManagementView This is the background class to the PatientLikeManagementView.bxml
PatientLikeSheet This is the background class to the PatientLikeSheet.bxml.
PatientNavigationButton This button is used as the navigation button for a PatientDetailView in the GUI
SimpleButton This is a simple button
SimpleLinkButton This is a simple button, that looks like a link in a webbrowser
TimeSpanContainer This is the background class for the TimeSpanContainer.bxml
TimeSpanContainerListener.Adapter Table pane listener adapter.
ViewController This controller loads the different views
 

Package at.easydiet.view Description

This package contains all background classes for the Pivot GUI
